attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its not fair!! ever since the xbox 360 has come out you can't get the new games for the xbox but you can on all the other consoles please could you help it in a really good machine! i think if they don't do nothing they should give us an exchange for the old xbox for the new xbox 360 because all the money we have spent on them and all the stuff for them has stopped still! i think they shoul bring them back i have got two my children have had theres for years and now they have justed stopped but the playstation and all the other consoles haven't

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
